dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: I've been searching for the legendary sword my whole life.

dialogue.speaker: Old Wise Man
dialogue.text: The sword you seek is hidden in a temple deep within the forest. But beware, the temple is guarded by fearsome beasts and treacherous traps.

dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: Thank you for your warning. I'm not afraid of a few obstacles.

dialogue.speaker: Old Wise Man
dialogue.text: Very well, but don't say I didn't warn you. May the gods be with you on your quest.
